shri lankawa heta awasan purwa wataye tharagawalata ekwimata niyamithaya.shri lankawa ha honkon athara tharagaye lakunu thaththwaya wuye 15 – 5, 14 - 9, 14 -8 ha 17 - 11 k washayeni.eeye tharagayata shri lanka pile gol shutar thisala algama krida nokala athara aya wenuwata chathurangi jayasuriya ek wuwa ya.honkon kridikawo tharagaya awasanaye lakunu paratharaya adu kirimata balawath uthsahayaka yeduni.heta pawathwena awasan purwa tharaga watayata malayasiyawa, singappuruwa, indiyawa ha shri lankawa sudusukam laba atha.paswani, 6 wani sthana sandaha thayilanthaya ha honkon tharaga wadimata niyamithaya.aasiyanu yowun netbol tharagawaliye awasan maha tharagaya 10 da pawathwimata niyamithaya.
